item.title: 14.2.5 Using workspaces for multiple environments
item.description: 14.2.5 Using workspaces for multiple environments OCI provides several Regions. Depending on your needs, you may need to create the same resource in multiple Regions at once. However, as we saw briefly in the previous practice, when the terraform setting is executed, the state is managed as terraform.tfstate in the corresponding folder by default. You can copy the entire Terraform setting folder itself and use it for each target region, but management becomes cumbersome.
